about_the_game:
The Multiverse Trilogy is a fast-paced, FPS, prequel to Alternate Universe that takes heavy inspiration from Ultrakill.

THEY LIED TO US

Your journey begins with you picking up a single weapon, but as you progress through and the enemies are becoming stronger, your arsenal grows. Use your weapons to kill the enemies and save your universe from danger.

WE WERE LED INTO A TRAP

  • You, employee, and the team must protect your universe from upcoming enemies before it’s too late.
  • Use your many weapons in your arsenal to stay alive and avoid the relentless attacks of your enemies.
  • If you ever low on health, there are heal pods scattered through your surrounding areas. Use them wisely.

THEY GAVE US NON-FUNCTIONAL WEAPONS AND LEFT US TO DIE

  • I SHOULD HAVE DECIDED TO (NOT ALIVE) RIGHT THEN AND THERE
  • BECAUSE THIS IS SO MUCH WORSE

name: The Multiverse Trilogy Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel® Core™ i7-8700 CPU @ 3.70GHz or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 @ 3GB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-9700TE Processor (12M Cache, up to 3.80 GHz)
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
